name: GangZoneCreate
notes: This function merely CREATES the gangzone, you must use GangZoneShowForPlayer or GangZoneShowForAll to show it.
warnings:
There is a limit of 1024 gangzones.
Putting the parameters in the wrong order results in glitchy behavior.

params_body.name: minx
params_body.description: The X coordinate for the west side of the gangzone.

params_body.name: miny
params_body.description: The Y coordinate for the south side of the gangzone.

params_body.name: maxx
params_body.description: The X coordinate for the east side of the gangzone.

params_body.name: maxy
params_body.description: The Y coordinate for the north side of the gangzone.

return_values: The ID of the created zone, returns -1 if not created
code:
MinY
             v
      MinX > *-------------
             |            |
             |  gangzone  |
             |   center   |
             |            |
             -------------* < MaxX
                          ^
                          MaxY
related_fn:
GangZoneDestroy: Destroy a gangzone.
 GangZoneShowForPlayer: Show a gangzone for a player.
 GangZoneShowForAll: Show a gangzone for all players.
 GangZoneHideForPlayer: Hide a gangzone for a player.
 GangZoneHideForAll: Hide a gangzone for all players.
 GangZoneFlashForPlayer: Make a gangzone flash for a player.
 GangZoneFlashForAll: Make a gangzone flash for all players.
 GangZoneStopFlashForPlayer: Stop a gangzone flashing for a player.
 GangZoneStopFlashForAll: Stop a gangzone flashing for all players.
